item.description:
Local investor Shayne McGlone
will be presenting his strategies for suburban real estate redevelopment.
Shayne is an expert in septic system design, Title V inspections and soil evaluation.

You will learn:

* Septic Systems 101
* Title V requirements
* Avoiding costly mistakes related to septic systems issues
* Identifying opportunities with septic system issues
* Obtaining variances to get your project done
* Case studies of actual projects


Holiday Inn, 929 Hingham St, Rockland MA
Networking starts at 6:00PM
Non-Members Pre-Register Today and Save at www.EasternMassREIA.com

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Eastern Mass REIA Monthly Meeting Rockland
